column4: GPG error:  http://repository.cairo-dock.org jaunty Release: The following signatures couldnt be verified because the public key isnt available: NO_PUBKEY 1392A97E41317877 <-- How can I correct this?
i dont want to install cairo dock
i need to know thow to correct this GPG verification error
Remove the repository from your sources.  Check System>Administration>Software Sources
You must have. We do not magically add things to the sources.list
Regardless of whether you did or didnt, there is something in your sources giving you that error.
i am not sure which entry is supposed to be faulty: http://pastebin.ca/1430468
Can you pastebin the result of:  ls /etc/apt/sources.list.d/
ls /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ is not generating any results
Can you check in System>Administration Software sources in the third party sources tab?
i can see a cairo-dock source there, but it isnt in the /etc/apt/sources.list
It looks like that key error is due to missing the docky GPG key for their ppa
This is the correct page where their gpg key is listed: http://keyserver.ubuntu.com:11371/pks/lookup?search=0x28A8205077558DD0&op=index
but i dont want to install cairo-dock so do i still need to do all that?
